Package org.apache.lenya.cms.publication.templating

Interface Summary
Instantiator Object to create an instance of a templating-enabled publication.
PublicationTemplateManager Component to manage publication templates.
PublicationVisitor Publication visitor interface.
SourceVisitor  
VisitingSourceResolver URI resolver.
 

Class Summary
AllExistingSourceResolver Source visitor to obtain all existing sources.
ExistingAncestorSourceResolver Source visitor to obtain the first existing source.
ExistingSourceResolver Source visitor to obtain the first existing source.
 

Exception Summary
TemplatingException
